Articles.Content:
Goal

It's pretty simple. Using Infernal robotics, throw a OCTO probe (the thick one) attached to a parachute as far as possible, preferably using a catapult-like contraption.

Rules

You MUST make the craft in the SPH and toss the probe along the runway.

100 parts limit.

Parts CANNOT be destroyed.

Your throwing craft does not have to be a catapult, you can for example use rails to come up with some thing similar to the crossbow,

If your throwing craft is a catapult, you do not have to throw overarm.

The arm for the catapult (or whatever you're using) must not exceed the length of 20 Modular Girder Segment XL's.

Stock + Magic Smoke Industries parts.

No engines of any sort (no jets or rockets)

Post 3 screenshots:

Craft on the runway

The probe and parachute with the Launch craft targeted.

The probe and parachute and mission log (F3).

Scoring

Distance between the probe and launch vehicle after throw.

My Entry

Javascript is disabled. View full album
